channel.title: Can't host on a Laptop?
channel.description: I have hosted a server on my main computer for a long time. But then i got a laptop so i used a linksys thing to get internet off the computer i hosted the server on. But now that the internet is shared with my laptop, people can no longer get on my server. I can still get it on using the ip 127.0.0.1, but i cannot get on using the ip turboscapev2.no-ip.biz, which is the advertised ip that people use to get on the server. I have tried hosting the server on my laptop just to see if it would work..... any suggestions?

item.title: Can't host on a Laptop?
item.dc:creator: @ipwnurgfsass ipwnurgfsass
item.description:
@ipwnurgfsass wrote:

do you have no-ip on your laptop?

item.title: Can't host on a Laptop?
item.dc:creator: @crown_extacy crown extacy
item.description:
@crown_extacy wrote:

I have hosted a server on my main computer for a long time. But then i got a laptop so i used a linksys thing to get internet off the computer i hosted the server on. But now that the internet is shared with my laptop, people can no longer get on my server. I can still get it on using the ip 127.0.0.1, but i cannot get on using the ip turboscapev2.no-ip.biz, which is the advertised ip that people use to get on the server. I have tried hosting the server on my laptop just to see if it would work… any suggestions?
